args:
When Nedrick appears with Zethia and the rest
of Agito, he produces a historical tome and
claims that HE is the true seventh scion—
one swapped out with the prince in the cradle.
The stunned party is then attacked by Valyx,
who is being controlled by a strange mask.
Enough, Valyx! I don't want to hurt you!
You think this is enough to bring me down?\nThe battle has only begun, and it shall\nrage until one of us... AAARGH!
Dude, some crazy mask thing just\nshowed up on your bro's face!
It seems this tedious brotherly quarrel\nis finally at an end.
About time! Aaah ha ha ha!
Kya ha ha! NOW you notice?
Be careful, everyone—I sense another\nof these fell creatures nearby.
In order to protect such fools\nas these, O king...
These must be the folks what made Valyx\nlose his marbles. Also, how many of 'em\nARE there? They just keep comin'!
What did you do to Valyx,\nand what is that mask he's wearing?

It is a magical tool introduced long ago in
the north. It amplifies true emotions—
those hidden in the depths of the mind—
and lays them bare on the surface.
So then. You have come at last,\n{player_name}.
Are you the one who took Zethia?
If you seek your sister, she is here.
She is unharmed, I assure you.
But I ask you this, seventh scion of Alberia:\nWhat do you seek from this point forth?
I want to bring about a world where the\npeople of Alberia—and all my friends from\nany land—can live in peace!
So you intend to become a ruler of\nno ambition. Do you think this enough\nto safeguard your kingdom?
I am aware of the difficulties, but I will\nprotect everyone in the way I see fit!
The world is changing. Chaos reigns.\nYet you could not even see through\nPhares and Beren's pathetic scheming.
What do you know about their plans?!

It is not merely your brothers who plot in
the shadows—even now, the Ilian Church
extends tendrils across the land, giving
rise to a new threat in northern Grastaea.
You struggled to deal with the Other and\nwere flummoxed by our attacks as Agito.\nWhat can YOU hope to protect?
So you're leading them—leading Agito.\nWho ARE you?!
I am your light and your shadow,\n{player_name}.

You slept on in the warm bosom of the
royal family, ever unaware of the truth—
but the time has come to awaken.
...Ciella? The documents.
Guys, something on that book is GLOWING!
It is the royal family's crest.
This book is a document handed down in\nthe Alberian royal family for generations.

It was sealed away by Aurelius, but with
his death, the seal's power grew weak.
I took advantage of this to steal it away,
which is how it came to be in my hands.
It is an extensive chronicle of the Alberian\nroyal family, but I would draw your\nattention to one particular section:
Alberian Calendar, Year 287\nA seventh and eighth child have\nbeen born to King Aurelius.
This speaks to you and me,\n{player_name}.

However, ten days following the birth of
the seventh child, he was stricken with
wyrmscale and entered Ilia's arms
a mere month after his birth.
All right, that's quite enough of THIS\nparticular brand of nonsense!
Yeah, I mean, he's clearly not dead,\nbecause he's RIGHT THERE.
King Aurelius then welcomed a new,\nadopted son into his life.
This child henceforth became the\nseventh in line to the throne,\nPrince {player_name}.
And I am the true seventh scion—\nhe who was replaced BY you.
Dude, don't EVEN with this chump!\nIt's clearly a bunch of hooey!
Yes, a clear and obvious fabrication\nwrought by this horrid man.
If you would know the truth of my words,\nlook to the ashen-faced Grand Paladyn.
I'm sorry, everyone. I am so, so sorry.
So this was what you were hiding...
I thought it to be a lie at first. But when I\nwas shown the signature and the seal...
Look well, all of you, for this treaty is\nsigned by the noble who offered up their\nown child to the king.
That is my father's signature...and his seal.
Signatures and seals can be forged!
The royal seal is based on the same magic\nas the sacred shards; none other than the\nreigning king can alter it.
Yeah, well, this is STILL hooey!
Your story is rife with contradiction, sir!\nFor if what you say is correct and you are\nthe true prince, you would be dead!
I can produce decisive proof if you insist—\nbut first, it appears your fight is not ended.
You'd best be careful; the mask's power\ncontinues to be amplified, and this man's\nreason has fled him.
Fulminator! Grant me the power to rule\nover all! OVER AAAAAALL!
S-such fearsome mana... I heard Thor\nwas a powerful dragon, but I can hardly\nbelieve it possesses THIS much strength...
Valyx—you with whom I share a pact—\nI shall rise to the request howling from\nyour fierce warrior soul.
He who would be king of New Alberia,\nI shall see you consigned to oblivion!
He is beyond even my control now, I fear.\nSo then...what will you do?
Hold on, Valyx! I'll defeat you and\nbring you back to your senses!
